00001 #ifndef _AverageSimple_t_H_
00002 #define _AverageSimple_t_H_
00003 #include <iostream>
00004 // FLT_MAX
00005 //#include <values.h>
00006 #include <cfloat>
00007 #include <climits>
00008 #include <RtypesSubSet.h>
00009 #include <math.h>
00010 
00013 class AverageSimple_t {
00014 public:
00015   friend std::ostream &operator <<(std::ostream &os, AverageSimple_t &a);
00016 
00019   AverageSimple_t() : _n(0),
00020                 _sum(0.),
00021                 _sum2(0.) {};
00022 
00028   void add(Float_t value) {
00029     _n++; 
00030     _sum+=value; 
00031     _sum2+=value*value; 
00032   };
00033 
00038   void calculate() {
00039     if (_n>1) {
00040       Double_t mean=_sum/_n;
00041       Double_t sigma=sqrt((_sum2-mean*_sum)/(_n-1));
00042       _mean=mean;
00043       _sigma=sigma;
00044     }
00045   };
00046 
00050   Double_t mean() const {return _mean;};
00051 
00055   Double_t sigma() const {return _sigma;};
00056 
00059   UInt_t n() const {return _n;};
00060   
00063   Double_t sum() const {return _sum;};
00064 
00065   void operator+=(Float_t val) { this->add(val); };
00066 
00067 protected:
00068   UInt_t _n;
00069   union { 
00070     Double_t _sum;
00071     Double_t _mean;
00072   };
00073   union {
00074     Double_t _sum2;
00075     Double_t _sigma;
00076   };
00077 };
00078 
00079 inline std::ostream &operator <<(std::ostream &os, AverageSimple_t &a) {
00080   os << a._mean << "+-" 
00081      << a._sigma 
00082     ;
00083   return os;
00084 }
00085 
00086 #endif
